name: Tsukimi Planet
summary: A boy named Utarou wakes up in his deathbed, being told that he has a short amount of time left to live. As he's letting the news sink in, a girl that's apparently an alien named Tsukimi pops up by his window and offers to grant him any wish he has. What will he wish for, and how will it turn out for him?

name: Tsukumogami
summary:
Tsukumogami is the original Japanese version of 99 Spirits, a RPG/Puzzle game that revolves around the popular Japanese folklore of Tsukumogami, everyday objects coming alive on their 100th birthday.
The Game Features an original battle system where players will have to puzzle out the true identity of the enemy before defeating them.

name: TS Marketplace: Chatham Main Line Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: The Chatham Mainline Scenario Pack includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Chatham Mainline Route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this busy commuter route.

name: Tsykial
summary: Tsykial is a teaser game containing various logs, data files and images related to Five Nights at Treasure Island.

name: TsuukaI!! Slot Shooting
summary:
Tsuukai!! Slot Shooting is a 1996 puzzle game by Shoeisha for the PlayStation One & Sega Saturn consoles. In the game, blocks fall from above and you have to go around shooting the ones you don't want to fall onto the already prepared board.

The game features 4 different layers, but only one is playable at the beginning of the game, and also a 2 players cooperative mode. The gameplay is shoot 3 falling pieces of the same colour to make the detonator appear, when the detonator appear wait until is on the colour of the pieces on the bottom to shoot it and that make them disappear. A very hard difficulty makes the game a hard challenge for any player.

name: Tsundere Milfin
summary: Tsundere Milfin is a lighthearted and quirky match-3 puzzle game combined with a visual novel story. Solve puzzles and make the right choices in conversations to endear yourself and gain the favor of your boss.

name: Tsuyokiss Festival
summary: This is the latest in CandySoft’s Tsuyokiss series, as part of its 10th anniversary. It features new heroines Kachiki and Kitsune, along with side stories for the Tsuyokiss NEXT heroines and subcharacters.

name: TS Marketplace: GWR Churchward Panelled Toplights Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Churchward authorised the first toplight build in 1905, from 1907 they were built in large numbers. These two sets (57ft and 70ft) represent the earlier toplights with full panelling in the 1922 livery.

name: Tsym Online
summary:
Tsym Online is a new Hybrid style game that pairs RTS and Moba play for a new MMO experience! 
 
We are currently in development and hope to get closed beta testing by the summer!

name: Tsunagari Chess School
summary: A psychological horror game taking place in a Japanese chess school. Get to know the girls, go on dates, and prepare for the worst.

name: Tsuri Kichi Sanpei: Blue Marlin-hen
summary:
A fishing sim based on a manga license for the NES. It was developed by Victor Interactive and never released outside of Japan.

Tsurikichi Sanpei: Blue Marlin-hen is a fishing sim based on a manga and eventual anime named Tsurikichi Sanpei, following the adventures of a preternaturally gifted young fisherman and his travails in various fishing competitions.

The game is centered around one of these fishing competitions, where Sanpei has a limited amount of time to catch the largest blue marlin out of all the competitors. The player must make careful judgements and use their limited time wisely to find and hook the largest marlin they can before the competition ends.

The first game based on the Tsurikichi Sanpei license, Blue Marlin-hen was released on the NES and the MSX around the same time in 1988. Later, there would be a sequel of sorts for the MSX only in 1989 and a PS1 game much later in 2002.

In order to catch anything, the player must choose one of several regions of sea in which to fish. Areas which look promising have large fish icons. Time passes more quickly on this screen, so it's in the player's best interest to find a spot quickly.

Once a sea region has been selected, the player must choose the right kind of bait for hooking billfish and simply sit until they have a bite. At this point, the player must use the gauge above the screen to maneuver themselves and reel the fish on the line. Each fish is judged on its size and play resumes.

name: Tsumu Light
summary: Follow up to the 3D puzzle game Tsumu, both only released in Japan for the original Playstation.

name: Tsurugihime
summary: Tsurugihime is a side-scrolling action RPG. The last battle is in 100 days. It is up to the player to decide how to live until the day. Battle, ikusei, exploration, story, and even sister. "Craft" everything. An RPG that "crafts" fate.

name: Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou
summary: This is a visual novel about the feeling of first love, the bittersweet memories of our high school lives, a regret-filled summer.

name: Tsukuyomi: The Divine Hunter
summary: A New World from Visionary Creator Kazuma Kaneko. This roguelike card game is the latest work by the legendary creator, known for countless masterpieces.

name: Tsugunohi
summary: One of the most terrifying J-horror games of all time is coming to Steam at long last.What's more, all you have to do is make the player walk to the left !? This collection includes seven works from the Tsugunohi series, which is gaining popularity in Japan and abroad.

name: TS Marketplace: Feather River Canyon Scenario Pack 02
summary: The Western Pacific was one of America’s great railroads, famous for its scenic and rugged path through California’s Sierra Nevada Mountains via the majestic Feather River Canyon.

name: Tsukihime: The Other Side of Red Garden
summary: The second half of Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon-.

name: Tsuro: The Game of The Path - VR Edition
summary: Create your own journey with Tsuro: The Game of the Path. Place a tile and slide your stone along the path created, but take care! Other players' paths can lead you in the wrong direction - or off the board entirely! Paths will cross and connect, and the choices you make affect all the journeys across the board.

name: Tsukumogamis!
summary: The not-at-all heartwarming school gag game ”Tsukumogamis!". Sumika, a girl possessed by a half-human Musubi, born of a Tsukumogami god father and a mother of kotodama, is a reclusive and scruffy JK! Will Musubi be able to collect many "good words" and become a man of his own?

name: Tsuki's Odyssey
summary: Tsuki’s Odyssey is a passive adventure game that immerses you into the world of Tsuki and the oddball characters of Mushroom Village. Decorate your home, make friends, catch all kinds of fish and so much more! It is important to note that Tsuki is not your pet, but a free spirit who will move and interact with the world as they please. But if you check in often, you just might catch something new and exciting happening in the town!

name: TS Marketplace: LMS P1&P2 LMS Late Coach Pack Add-On
summary: The LMS P1&P2 LMS Late is a TS Marketplace for Train Simulator

name: Tsugunohi: Pocky Dog’s Adventure
summary: "Tsugunohi" and the video game play-by-play artist, Pocky, have collaborated. "Tsugunohi -Pocky dog’s adventure-," created in conjunction with Pocky's 10th anniversary event, is now available on Steam. Lured by a white butterfly, Pocky the dog's "little adventure" now begins.

name: TS Marketplace: GWR Churchward Panelled Toplights Pack 03 Add-On
summary: Stylish, classical and comfortable – and now toplights available in Train Simulator!

name: Tsukumono Yume
summary: Tsukumono Yume is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. There are two playable characters, Kozuki and Amatsuki. There are several endings that can be gotten with Amatsuki, depending on how many NPCs are killed, how many times the player is caught by chasers and whether or not certain events were seen.

name: Tsukumono
summary: Aim for a 999 chain! A brand new experience combining tower defence and matching tile puzzle games into a game you can easily play in 1-5 minute bursts! Let's try it for how many times you can chain. Online battles are supported in game so test your might against players from around the country!

name: Tsumikui: Sen no Noroi, Sen no Inori for V
summary:
Adds:
* A full route for Kagerou.
* Afterstories for Ren, Morihito, Shio, Souta, and Touji.
* Extra scenes and CGs.
* A touch voice feature for the gallery that unlocks after each route clear.

name: Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon - Limited Edition
summary: The Limited Edition includes Tsukihime -A Piece of Blue Glass Moon-, the Special Material Book “Tsukihime Material Ⅰ -material of blue glass moon-“ and a Collector’s Box.

name: Tsukihime
summary:
This story is about a young boy named Tohno Shiki who, after experiencing a traumatic accident, wakes up in the hospital with the ability to see lines and cracks in every surface and being. These lines, when traced with any sharp or blunt edge, will be permanently cut. As he is forced to see these lines everywhere, Shiki is distraught until he meets a mage girl who gives him glasses that allow him to live a normal life.

Years later, after living in a relative's home, the death of his father has him summoned back to the mansion he left years ago. There he must learn to live with his younger sister and two maid girls.

One day Shiki's life takes a turn for the worst when, on the way to school, he meets a blonde woman and he's overcome with the urge to kill her.

name: Tsuki to Taiyou no Raksharuki 2: Sabaku no Kuni no Ohime-sama
summary: As a trader, Karim trades while moving east, west, south, and north through the desert. One day, a year after he got the legendary "magic lamp" with beautiful dancers.

name: TS Marketplace: Baltimore & Ohio RF-16 Livery Pack
summary: American railroading of the memorable early diesel era comes alive with the iconic Baldwin RF-16 “Sharknose” diesel in the classic livery of the historic Baltimore & Ohio.

name: Tsumamigui 2
summary: A visual novel from Alicesoft and the second game in the Tsumamigui series.

name: Tsuki wa Kirisaku: Tantei Sagara Kyouichirou
summary: A detective adventure game in the veins of visual novels featuring a third-rate private investigator, Kyouichirou Sagara.

name: Tsuppari Oozumou: Heisei-han
summary: An enhanced re-release of the 1987 Tsuppari Oozumou game for Famicom.

name: Tsan-shadow Ninja
summary: Tsan-shadow ninja is a 2D platform adventure game with stealth and combat elements The mechanics are based on stealth and the use of abilities acquired through ninja training! You will feel like a real shinobi when you attack unexpectedly or sneak around unnoticed...

name: TS Academy: I Became A JK But, I'm Still An Honors Student
Tsundere Idol: My Personal M-Pet
summary: Tsundere Idol is the story of Kota, a mild-mannered student in Japan and idol sensation Rui Kurumizaka. Too shy to approach the popular Rui, Kota is happy just to be in the same class at college. Then one day an accident occurs and the contents of Rui's bag spill out on the floor revealing a naughty magazine! Our hero steps up to claim ownership and an unexpected and unusual affair begins.

name: Tsugi no Giseisha wo Oshirase Shimasu: Kimi to Ko no Hateru Kotonai Kurayami wo
summary: Morisaki Noboru, an ordinary high school student, suddenly reunites with Aoki Kana, whom he dated a year and a half ago. However, this reunion is not what either of them wanted, as they have been abducted by a malicious third party. Just as they are trying to sort out the incomprehensible situation, Asakawa Kaede and Sasagi Miki suddenly appear and tell them that they are currently on the 49th floor of an abandoned building, that it is an enclosed space with no way to get down to the floors below, and that there are other people in the main hall. They are then confronted with a shocking truth: they have been forced to take part in a "Serial Killer Game" where losing means death. Will Morisaki Noboru and Aoki Kana be able to escape safely?

name: Tsugunohi: The Chamber of Phantom Name
summary: "Tsugunohi -The Chamber of Phantom Name-" Launches on Steam! A new graduate, Kana Sakuragi, begins her new life in a renovated old house, "Akembara House." What seemed like a shiny, ideal property soon turns into a nightmare, as she is plagued by strange phenomena every night...

name: Tsuki no Hikari no Kusariya-san
summary:
"I'll take on all your pain and suffering."

A slightly dark fantasy romance novel about spending time with a young wizard.

name: Tsunagaru Voiro Shooters vs. Space Kedamaki
summary: It is a shooting game to collect and connect friends.

name: Tsubasa no Oka no Hime: A Red and Blue Moon Finite Loop
summary:
An otome game by Snapdragon.

The story is set at the 19th century at the United Kingdom, in a rural town called Wingfield.

name: TS Marketplace: Sherman Hill Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Sherman Hill Scenario Pack 01 – featuring 10 highly realistic career scenarios – brings to life challenging contemporary freight railroading on one of America's busiest and most famous railroad routes – Union Pacific's Sherman Hill.

name: Tsjost's Heroic Soup Bazooka
summary:
Solve puzzles by eating foodstuff and pushing boulders.
Can you figure out how to escape?

name: Tsurimasu
summary: The mouse is the controller! Go fishing with “Tsurimasu”, a mouse combined with a fishing rod! A whole new operating experience awaits you!

name: TS!Underswap
summary: An unofficial fan-game of Toby Fox's Undertale. Explore a re-imagined world based on the premise of swapping character roles, and adding original content, to create new scenarios.

name: Tsumi no Hikari Rendezvous
summary:
In front of the lone tunnel leading out from the small village of Tamasato, Yuuto draws a picture of a mermaid living in the deep ocean where light does not reach. One day, he looked up from his drawing and there was a girl in front of him who looked just like the one on his canvas. She called herself a ‘sinner’ who came to this town to repent for her sins. Yuuto and the townspeople welcomed the girl, Ai, to their town.

Come spring, the entrance ceremony was underway. The new students took pictures and videos in front of the school with their parents to commemorate this special day. However, it was a depressing event for Yuuto, who lives alone after the death of his father and the abandonment by his mother and older sister. While he had gotten used to it, this time he suddenly felt very lonely due to the recent passing of grandmother, the sole close relative he had left.

Upon finding out about Yuuto’s loneliness, Ai confided that she was abandoned by her parents. She searched for a reason for living, whereas he ran away from reality through his imaginative drawings. Even though they were polar opposites, their backgrounds also made them quite similar. Gradually, they became closer to each other, while harbouring secrets of their own.

name: TS Marketplace: Network Southeast BR Class 313 Livery Pack
summary: The Class 313 Network Southeast Livery Pack, which requires the London Overground BR Class 313 EMU Add-on to use, enables you to drive the Class 313 as it appeared under the Network Southeast Sector.The Class 313 was built to revolutionise suburban travel within London.

name: Tsukichi Chronicles
summary: Tsukichi is a captivating game that'll keep you entertained for hours. With its blend of story, combat, and exploration, you are sure to have an incredible experience. So, if you're looking for an action RPG with an engaging story, intense combat, and beautiful scapes, Tsukichi is perfect for you!

name: Tsioque
summary: Tsioque is an animated adventure game inspired by classic 80s and 90s point and click titles. Craftily mixing influences of games like Day of the Tentacle, Dragon's Lair or Humongous Games' Pajama Sam, it offers its own, original narrative experience, which can be described as both dark and adorable.

name: Tsarevna
summary: Tsarevna is the world’s first ballet-inspired slasher set in a world of Slavic mythology.

name: TS Marketplace: Soldier Summit & Salt Lake City Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: The Denver & Rio Grande Western (D&RGW) was one of America's most famous and fabulous railroads, and now you can go to work on the remarkable Rio Grande in ten highly authentic and diverse career scenarios!

name: Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon
summary: A remake of Type-Moon's classic doujin game Tsukihime, featuring a rewritten scenario with major differences in its setting and plot, as well as several new characters.

name: TS Marketplace: Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 02
summary: Fast, famous, and action-packed – that’s America’s remarkable Northeast Corridor! And now, High Iron Simulations brings all the diversity and exhilarating action of the NEC to life with Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 02!

name: TS Marketplace: Surselva Line Christmas Scenario Pack
summary: Enjoy some festive fun this Christmas with Rivet Games' Surselva Line Christmas Scenario Pack!

name: T Simulator
summary: This is a sandbox simulator... an actual sandbox!

name: TS Marketplace: GP40-2 Mini Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Climb aboard the powerful Electro-Motive GP40-2 diesel locomotive for challenging western U. S. railroading in High Iron Simulations' GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 01!

name: Tsuro: The Game of The Path
summary: Create your own journey with Tsuro: The Game of the Path. Place a tile and slide your stone along the path created, but take care! Other players' paths can lead you in the wrong direction - or off the board entirely! Paths will cross and connect, and the choices you make affect all the journeys across the board.

name: TS Marketplace: Horseshoe Curve Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: In American railroading, there are few names and places that evoke more history and drama than the great Pennsylvania Railroad and Horseshoe Curve. Now you can breathe in the atmosphere of the Pennsylvania Railroad in its glory days in Horseshoe Curve Scenario Pack 01!

name: TS Marketplace: Metro-North Scenario Pack 01
summary: Tackle the challenges of modern railroading on one of America's biggest, busiest, and most dynamic commuter railroads – with Metro-North Scenario Pack 01!

name: TSI Cycles
summary: Game where you should color the screen, similar to snake, without crashing.

name: Tsubame no Sedai
summary: A young man, rational and cold-blooded because he has lived on the battlefield since childhood, is attacked and injured by bandits. Injured, he takes refuge in a nearby abandoned shelter. There he meets someone. She is an android girl who was manufactured in the olden days as a babysitter.

name: Tsurikko Penta
summary: Fishing medal game, starring Penta from the Antarctic Adventure series.

name: TS Marketplace: Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Experience ultra-action-packed and authentic railroading on America's famous Northeast Corridor!

name: TS Marketplace: Alaska Railroad Scenario Pack 01
Tsukodome
summary: Tsukodome is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Hikutsuki and the objective is to explore and collect effects to unlock the endings.

name: TS Marketplace: Fife Circle Scenario Pack 01
summary: Return to the busy hub of Edinburgh Waverley, and get to work on a variety of services over the stunning Forth Rail Bridge and around the east coast of Scotland with Larias Games’ Fife Circle Scenario Pack 01.

name: TS Marketplace: North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Train Simulator's North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines route is host to 100+ route miles of contemporary American commuter railroading – and now the new North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 puts you at the throttle for realistic, diverse, and challenging NJ Transit commuter operations!

name: TS Marketplace: FahrBar Charity Coach Pack
summary: Enjoy a nice drink and take in stunning scenery on relaxing Swiss rail journeys; the unique and legendary Projekt fahrBar coach comes to Train Simulator Classic courtesy of Rivet Games!

name: TS Marketplace: Munich-Augsburg Scenario Pack 01
summary: Challenge yourself with more epic content for the German High-speed network! Munich - Augsburg Scenario Pack 01

name: Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan - Digital Deluxe Edition
TS Marketplace: Weardale & Teesdale Scenario Pack 01
summary: The Weardale & Teesdale Scenario Pack 01 – complete with 10 authentic and realistic career scenarios – brings you back to the good ol' days of classic British Railways duties!

name: T-Shrek
summary: PS1 style horror game about Shrek in T-Pose that want to kill you.

name: TS Marketplace: Western Maryland Scenario Pack 01
summary: The Western Maryland, a classic and admired railroad fondly nicknamed the “Wild Mary,” comes to captivating life in High Iron Simulations’ Western Maryland Scenario Pack 01.

name: Tsuri Tarou
summary: Tsuri Tarou is a Sports game, published by Pack-In-Video, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Tsukasa no Satisfaction
summary:
One year after events of "Natsuiro ☆ Communication ♪".

Main character is visited by Tsukasa suddenly while he prepares to summer with his lover Chinatsu. Tsukasa wants help with practice for the drama club. A long night of trouble begins.

name: Tsunami 2265
summary: A game inspired by the anime genre mecha.

name: TS Marketplace: NER/GNR Non-Corridor BR Pack
summary: These coaches of North Eastern Railway and Great Northern Railway pedigree were built from around 1907. The NER coaches were built under the direction of Wilson Worsdell (the CME of the NER) whilst the GNR were designed by Sir Herbert Nigel Gresley (CME of the GNR and LNER).

name: TS Marketplace: North Wales Coastal Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: All told, North Wales Coastal Scenario Pack 01 provides more than 11 hours of challenging and exciting historic action to the "Land of Old Fathers".

name: Tsuukai Gyaguabanchuuru: Naruto Maki Hichou
summary: Adult adventure game developed by Lucifer Soft in 1990.

name: TS Marketplace: Granger Heartland Scenario Pack 01
summary: Union Pacific's Kansas City-Topeka main line is a famed American route that is bustling with traffic, as up to 60 trains a day hustle (at speeds up to 70 mph) along the line laden with tonnage including intermodal traffic, coal, automobiles, grain, and manufactured products.

name: Tsuki ni Yorisou Otome no Sahou: Hidamari no Hibi
TS Marketplace: CSX Scenario Pack 02
summary: Now, CSX Scenario Pack 02, from developer High Iron Simulations, brings the drama and diversity of CSX railroading to Train Simulator with ten authentic career scenarios that re-create the railroading of CSX and its predecessors on three popular Train Simulator routes!

name: TSA Frisky VR
summary: In TSA Frisky, you are a TSA agent with the daunting task of surviving your shift. Manage lines, luggage, and leisure, to keep from blacking out on the job. Survive your shifts to earn promotions and upgrades to become the TSA's most effective employee.

name: Tsurikkuma
summary: Tsurikkuma is one of the games that can be played on Nico Nico Live.

name: Tsunoda Thunder
summary: A doujin side-scrolling shooter developed by Team Gris Gris.

name: TS2: Train Signalling Simulator
summary: An open source railway simulation game where you have to dispatch trains across an area and keep them on schedule.

name: TS Marketplace: LMS P1&P2 BR Maroon Coach Pack Add-On
summary: The LMS Period 1 coaches were wooden framed and panelled with beading. These coaches also utilised the British Standard corridor connector as opposed to the Pullman gangway which was later adopted as the standard for rolling stock on many other regions.

name: Tsujidou-san no Jun'ai Road
summary: Hiroshi was a student at Inamura Academy in Kanagawa Shounan and became interested in his delinquent classmate Tsujidou-san after seeing her help a kitty in the rain. But everyone around her are also delinquents, including her rivals Maki and Renna. The life of an ordinary guy like him just got a lot more troubled!

name: TS Marketplace: Clinchfield Railroad Scenario Pack 01
summary: Experience ultra-authentic Appalachian railroading at its challenging best – with High Iron Simulations' Clinchfield Railroad Scenario Pack 01 for Train Simulator!

name: TS Marketplace: South London Network Scenario Pack 01
summary: Face tight timetables and adverse weather conditions, and perform everything from ordinary commutes to empty stock and depot manoeuvres! Step up to the challenge with Larias Games' South London Network Scenario Pack 01!

name: TS Marketplace: CSX Scenario Pack 01
summary: CSX Scenario Pack 01, from High Iron Simulations, brings the captivating experiences and challenges of CSX railroading to life in Train Simulator.

name: TS Marketplace: North Jersey Coast Line Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: North Jersey Coast Line Scenario Pack 01 – featuring 10 highly realistic career scenarios – brings to life the action-packed railroading of this famed U. S. commuter and passenger route operated by NJ Transit.

name: TS Marketplace: Metronom Scenario Pack Add-On
summary: Metronom Scenario Pack includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Hamburg-Hanover Route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this commuter route.

name: TS Marketplace: Springfield Line Scenario Pack 01
summary: Return to a classic era of American railroading and the glory days of the legendary New Haven Railroad, with Springfield Line Scenario Pack 01 from High Iron Simulations!

name: Tsuyokiss 2gakki
summary: A retelling of Tsuyokiss which takes place a few months after Otome has started living together with Leo (before the game enters any routes) and introduces the transfer student, Celeb, who joined Leo's class.

name: TS Marketplace: CSX Hanover Subdivision Scenario Pack 01
summary: The history-rich and scenic countryside of Maryland and Pennsylvania await you in Train Simulator’s CSX Hanover Subdivision route – and now CSX Hanover Subdivision Scenario Pack 01 delivers more railroading experiences on this remarkable route!

name: TS Marketplace: Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue Scenario Pack 01
summary: Revisit the lost rails of the Woodhead Line with Seven Hills Simulations' Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue Scenario Pack 01!

name: Tsukiakari no Kan kara no Dasshutsu
Tsukame, Jinsei no Migiuchi! GoGo Zenkaiten Arashi wo Yobu! Honoo no Pachinkas Road
summary:
The main character, Gintarou, is a salaryman working at a cell phones sale company. Ever since his senior taught him how to play Pachinko, he's been going to the Pachinko parlor to play. One day, he sees a customer who seems to have lost at Pachinko.

“ Uwaaaaaaaaaaaan—!!! Uwaaaaaaaaa—!!!”

The man's roar echoed sadly. I felt as if there were a melody... like a flower yearning for the spring breeze. People passing through simply laughed at the man and took pictures, eventually an employee came from inside the store and taps the man on the shoulder, signalling him to leave. It's surely an unacceptable reality for that man... I can understand how he feels. Because I, too, am a man on the loser's path. That man's present will become my future.

That is how the protagonist is living, before he meets “Reiyo Yuria” at the Pachinko parlor, changing his life completely...

name: Tsunami Cruiser
summary: This is a next-gen wavy navy, geometry wars style! In this twin stick shooter, you have to guide your boat through ever rougher seas, and destroy all enemies.

name: TS Marketplace: Munich to Garmisch Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Munich to Garmisch Scenario Pack 01 includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Munich to Garmisch Partenkirchen route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this scenic part of Bavaria.Take the controls of BR442, ICE 3, ICE-T and BR 426 to haul passengers on regular train services along the line following real world...

name: Tsuppari Oozumou: Risshin Shusse-hen
summary: Tsuppari Oozumou: Risshin Shusse-hen is a Sports game, developed and published by Tecmo, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: TS Marketplace: COV AB Vans Wagon Pack 02
summary: Into the 1960’s British Railways mainly provided 12T vehicles for the covered carriage of general merchandise, the exception being those vans intended to work on the train ferry services to Europe.

name: TS Marketplace: Renewable Energy Pack
summary: Renewable Energy PackThe drive for renewable energy sources has begun to make its mark on the landscape across many parts of the world.

name: TS Marketplace: Caledonian Railway 65ft Grampian BR Crimson & Cream Coach Pack Add-On
summary: These coaches were built between 1903 and 1909 to the design of John McIntosh, the Locomotive Superintendent of the Caledonian Railway, for the Glasgow, Edinburgh and Aberdeen service known as "The Grampian Express".

name: Tsukibito
summary: Tsukibito is a SNK Playmore developed Japanese exclusive Nintendo DS action game about supernatural beings.

name: TS Marketplace: British Railways Class A2 Livery Pack Add-On
summary: The British Railways Class A2 Livery Pack, which requires the LNER Peppercorn Class A2 'Blue Peter' Loco Add-On to use, enables you to drive the A2 as it appeared under British Railways ownership in the 1950s-60s. The Arthur Peppercorn-designed A2 Class locomotive was built at Doncaster Works between 1947 and 1948.

name: TS Marketplace: BDA 80t Bogie Bolster Wagon Pack
summary: There had been a ten year gap between the last vacuum braked bogie steel carrier design and the first new air braked design in 1972.

name: TS Marketplace: BR Blue-Grey Coaches Pack 02
summary: The BR Blue-Grey Coaches Pack 02 recreates certain specialised coach types which were retained after nationalisation by British Railways. Owing to a shortage of more modern Mk1 variants to fulfil the need for sleeper and buffet cars, these pre-nationalisation coaches remained in service and were repainted in BR Blue-Grey livery.

name: Tsumannai
summary:
"Who killed her?"

The main character, Amasawa Minato, had a lover named Nanaka Watanabe. However, one day, Nanaka is killed by someone.

A short BL visual novel.

name: Tsuyokiss
summary:
Tsuyokiss is about the lives of a group of high school students and the often comedic events that occur around them. The protagonist is an ordinary boy named Leo Tsushima. He is secretly in love with the eldest daughter of the Kiriya Corporation, Erika Kiriya, who is also the student council president.

One day, a senior female student, Otome Kurogane, knocks out several of the main characters when they were trying to sneak into school being late. Surprisingly, it turns out that she is Leo’s beloved cousin that he had not seen for years. And she decides to move in to the same house with Leo, whose mediocre life starts to change into something a lot more exciting.

name: Tsuyokiss 3gakki
summary: A further retelling of Tsuyokiss and Tsuyokiss 2gakki, takes place a few months after Celeb has transferred to Leo's class (but before the game enters any routes).

name: Tsumera
summary: Taiwanese PC Pinball game.

name: TS Marketplace: Lake Constance Scenario Pack
summary: Return to the picturesque "Seelinie” and take in the views, with some brand-new scenarios for the Lake Constance route from Rivet Games.

name: TS Marketplace: New York – New Haven Scenario Pack 02 Add-On
summary: Extending north and east from New York City's two great passenger stations - New York's Penn Station and Grand Central Terminal - to New Haven, Connecticut, Train Simulator's NEC: New York - New Haven route represents one of America's busiest and most famous rail lines.

name: Tsukumohime
summary: 《Tsukumohime》是一款幻想的古代東洋風遊戲，玩家扮演的「創物者」，在一個神秘的世界中，帶領化身美少女的「物靈」們展開一場不可思議的冒險旅程。

name: TS Marketplace: Union Pacific Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Climb aboard for modern and realistic Union Pacific freight railroading on the railroad's great main lines across Wyoming's high plains and California's Sierra Nevada Mountains - with Union Pacific Scenario Pack 01!

name: TS Marketplace: Köln Koblenz Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Köln- Koblenz Scenario Pack 01 includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Köln - Koblenz route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this scenic part of the West Rhine.Take the controls of Sgns Hopper Pack, Rnoos Hopper Pack and Sgns Container Pack to haul passengers and freight on regular train services along the line...

name: TS Marketplace: Maunsell 59ft Low Window Corridor Coach Pack BR Green
summary: Take your simulation to the next level with these gorgeous Low Window Corridor Coaches!

name: Tsuma ga Kirei ni Natta Wake
summary: A visual novel from Orcsoft.

name: TS Marketplace: Caledonian Railway 65ft Grampian LMS Period 3 Coach Pack
summary: Caledonian Railway 65ft Grampian LMS Period 3 Coach Pack includes 10 different variants and is now available for Train Simulator!

name: TS Marketplace: Frankfurt - Koblenz Scenario Pack 01
summary: Take to the West Rhine rails on unique and challenging services with Larias Games’ Frankfurt - Koblenz Scenario Pack 01.

name: TS Marketplace: Sdggmrss Taschenwagen Wagon Pack
summary: The articulated Taschenwagen freight cars are used by Deutsche Bahn to transport truck trailers and containers of different sizes.

name: Tsumi
summary: Tsumi is a small arena-type action game where you try to survive as many waves of monsters as you can. Slash your way through the foes and delve into some dark secrets of this world.

name: Tsuki no Hikari: Shizumeru Kane no Satsujin
Tsuki Adventure
summary:
Join Tsuki in an awe-inspiring adventure and discover all the beauty that country life has to offer.
Journey to the beautiful countryside of Japan and explore a peaceful world

name: TS Marketplace: Peninsula Corridor: San Francisco - Gilroy Scenario Mini-Pack 02 Add-On
summary: Take the throttle for realistic, challenging, and diverse Union Pacific freight operations – with Peninsula Corridor: San Francisco - Gilroy Scenario Mini-Pack 02!

name: TS Marketplace: Sps 466 Wagon
summary: Enter the world of track construction with the Sps 466 sleeper transport wagon from Join Together for Train Simulator.

name: Tsugunohi: Supernatural Supermarket
summary: You only walk to the left. A classic entry in the J-horror Tsugunohi series now comes to Steam. A part-time high-school girl hears unsettling rumors inside the supermarket after closing time…

name: TS Marketplace: BR Blue-Grey Coaches Pack 03
summary: The BR Blue-Grey Coaches Pack 03 recreates various pre-nationalisation coaches which were retained in service by British Railways long after nationalisation.

name: TS Marketplace: Loadhaul CEA Covered Hopper Wagon Pack
summary: The CEA conversion was one of the later attempts to find a use for the large numbers of HEA hoppers that were standing around with very little to do as the requirements for domestic and industrial coal diminished.

name: Tsukkomi! Magical Balls
summary: A puzzle game from Mingeido.

name: TS Marketplace: Feather River Canyon Scenario Pack 01
summary: Bringing 8+ hours of new railroading challenges to Train Simulator's Feather River Canyon route, this new scenario pack features 10 realistic career scenarios.

name: TS Marketplace: Mittenwaldbahn Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Mittenwaldbahn Scenario Pack 01 includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Mittenwaldbahn: Garmisch-Partenkirchen - Innsbruck Route on Steam, covering passenger and freight operations across this border route.

name: Tsukikomori
summary: Tsukikomori is an Adventure game, developed by Pandora Box and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Tsuru Teruhito no Jissen Kabushiki Bi-Game
summary: A stock-trading simulation game for the PC Engine. Earn a fortune through savvy buying and selling.

name: TS Marketplace: Seaboard SD50 Livery Pack
summary: Tucked between the classic SD40-2 and the SD60 was a transitional model that would take the 645-series power plant to its highest levels of output and preview design features of the 60-series. That locomotive was the SD50.

name: Tsukino Paradise
summary: A music rhythm game with male singers released on iOS and Android devices.

name: Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou
summary: This is a visual novel about the feeling of first love, the bittersweet memories of our high school lives, a regret-filled summer.

name: Tsugunai: Atonement
summary: Tsugunai is the story of Reise, a warrior who has inadvertently angered the Goddess of Light by stealing the mystical Treasure Orb. As punishment, the Goddess of Light forever separates his soul from his body unless he atones for his sins by helping the people of Walondia. Without a physical body of his own, the only way to change the fates of the people is to possess them.

name: Tsuneko Apple
summary:
Tsuneko, a tortoiseshell cat, will grow up collecting apples.
When you see the game clear text somewhere, the game is clear!

name: Tsuushin Taisen Mahjong: Touryuumon
summary: Tsuushin Taisen Mahjong Touryuumon is a Mahjong game based on Yuki's arcade hit game.

name: TS Marketplace: Class 375 Southeastern Livery Pack Add-On
summary: Built by Bombardier in Derby, England, the Class 375 third-rail DC, 4 car electric multiple units entered service in April, 2001. They are a member of the Electrostar train family, the most numerous EMU built in post-privatisation Britain.

name: TS Marketplace: Union Pacific Scenario Pack 02 Add-On
summary: Climb aboard for modern, realistic, and challenging Union Pacific freight railroading in the rugged mountains of the fabulous America West – with Union Pacific Scenario Pack 02!

name: TS Marketplace: Pacific Surfliner Scenario Pack
summary: Soak up the Californian sun and get to work operating trains on the iconic Pacific Surfliner route with Larias Games’ latest scenario pack!

name: TS Marketplace: New York – New Haven Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: New York – New Haven Scenario Pack 01 – featuring 10 highly realistic new career scenarios – puts you at the throttle for passenger, commuter, and freight action on one of America's busiest and most famous railroad routes!

name: TS Marketplace: Soldier Summit & Salt Lake City Scenario Pack 02 Add-On
summary: High Iron Simulations' Soldier Summit & Salt Lake City Route Extension Scenario Pack 02 puts you in the engineer's seat for realistic and challenging big-time railroading in the American West!

name: TS Marketplace: GP40-2 Mini Scenario Pack 02 Add-On
summary: Take the throttle of the powerful Electro-Motive GP40-2 diesel locomotive for challenging railroading in the intense and bustling Northeastern U.S., in High Iron Simulations' GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02!

name: Tsunoda Thunder Love!!
summary: The sequel to Tsunoda Thunder by Team Gris Gris

name: TS Marketplace: Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01
summary: The magic, the challenges, and the railroading drama of historic Marias Pass awaits you – with the Train Simulator Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01 from High Iron Simulations!

name: TS Marketplace: London - Brighton Reigate Expansion Add-On
summary: Delve into South London and Surrey in Train Simulator with Rivet Games' expansion of London to Brighton, which adds Reigate station to the route.

name: TS Marketplace: GWR Churchward Panelled Toplights Pack 04 Add-On
summary: Stylish, classical and comfortable – and now toplights available in Train Simulator!

name: TS Marketplace: Norfolk Southern N-Line Scenario Pack 01
summary: Go to work on a classic American branch line and experience challenging and authentic workdays just like real railroaders do with Norfolk Southern N-Line Scenario Pack 01, from High Iron Simulations!

name: Tsumu
summary: Tsumu is 3D puzzle game where the player, as a hamster, uses a forklift to construct different images.

name: Tsarevna: A Medieval Russia Quest
summary:
Bob Bisquit is an American on a quest to win the heart of a beautiful Russian princess. Only the one who will find Tsarevna's real name can marry her, and thus Bob's journey begins.
Tsarevna is a puzzle-solving point-and-click adventure game, with cartoon-like 2D graphics reminiscent of the first two Monkey Island games and other adventure titles of the early nineties.
Puzzle solving is not the only aspect coming into picture in this game; players also get to take a look at life of a medieval Russian city (based on true historical facts!).

name: TS Marketplace: LMS Period 1 Non-Corridor Coach Pack BR Crimson
summary: The general styling of LMS Period I coaches followed much the same ideas which were used throughout Britain.

name: TS Marketplace: Maunsell 59ft Low Window Corridor Coach Pack Southern Malachite Green
summary: Take your simulation to the next level with these gorgeous Low Window Corridor Coaches! Built from 1926 to 1929 under the direction of Southern CME Richard Maunsell, these classical carriages were built to replace much of the wooden bodied pre-grouping stock Southern inherited from its constituents.

name: TS Marketplace: Miami – West Palm Beach Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Train Simulator's popular Miami – West Palm Beach route is a contemporary rail route along America’s Atlantic coast and is home to Amtrak intercity passenger trains, CSX freight operations, and Miami-area commuter services.

name: TSE: Reloaded
summary: In this new 2d action platformer, roll around as an oblong shape as you traverse the level geometry. In 'The Sleek Ellipsoid: Reloaded' (TSE: Reloaded) you can roll, jump and move around the level with total freedom!

name: TS Marketplace: B&O Mountain Subdivision Scenario Pack 01
summary: The highly acclaimed B&O Mountain Subdivision route for Train Simulator is momentous, with countless captivating railroading experiences to be discovered across its 140 route miles – and here’s a new scenario pack that delivers ten highly authentic operating challenges!

name: Tsetseg's Adventure
summary: Tsetseg, the little witch, is in crisis. Her friends are taken and converted to bad guys by the Mad Wizard. Explore castle, fight Bosses, rescue friends, regain special power, and defeat Mad Wizard! A classic pixel style, 2D platformer game.

name: TS Marketplace: DB Donnerbüchsen Coaches Pack
summary: The ‘Thunder Box’ is a two-axle coach design first manufactured in Germany in the 1920s for Deutsche Reichsbahn. The type was able to seat from 40 to 66 passengers, depending on which travel class they were configured for. Retirement began in the 1960s, though many Donnerbüchsen remain in use on preserved railway.

name: Tsumiki: Block Drop Mania
summary: A puzzle game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Tsukihime Plus-Disc
summary:
This is a fan disc of Tsukihime containing one short visual novel story, two omake stories and other fan materials.

Akira Seo, an underclassman of Tsukihime's Akiha Tohno, becomes acquainted with someone calling themselves Shiki Tohno, and together they set out to solve the mystery of a recent series of murders.

name: TSA: Thieves Strike Again
summary: TSA: Thieves Strike Again is a strategic FPS team-based game that has 5 maps and 7 game modes ready to be played.

name: TS Marketplace: LMS P1&P2 LMS Early Coach Pack Add-On
summary: The LMS Period 1 coaches were wooden framed and panelled with beading. These coaches also utilised the British Standard corridor connector as opposed to the Pullman gangway which was later adopted as the standard for rolling stock on many other regions.

name: Tsugunohi: A Voice from Yesteryear
summary: "Tsugunohi -A Voice from Yesteryear-" is one of the most popular titles in the "Tsugunohi" series. The game features a new route that can only be released after the game is cleared. In this realistic recreation of Japan's old-fashioned countryside, a number of terrifying events attack a young girl.

name: Tsubaki Hata
summary: Tsubaki Hata is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Tsuyaga~ru
summary:
What? I'm an oiran courtesan!?

Strange relationships begin with famous warriors of Japan's history...
The Shinsengumi, Ryoma Sakamoto, Shinsaku Takasugi and more!

Based on historical facts, experience the passionate, sweet and tragic love stories now!

name: Tsundere Simulator 2
summary:
Take the role of new student of high school for girls.
It's no easy to be a newcomer in new school. Try to get new friends, earn respect of students, become club member and become leader of the school.

name: Tsun Tsun Gumi: Suuji de Puni-puni
TS Marketplace: GWR Churchward Panelled Toplights Pack 06 Add-On
summary: Stylish, classical and comfortable – and now toplights available in Train Simulator!

name: TS Marketplace: COV AB Vans Wagon Pack 01
summary: Into the 1960’s British Railways mainly provided 12T vehicles for the covered carriage of general merchandise, the exception being those vans intended to work on the train ferry services to Europe.

name: Tsukihime: Fool's Errand
summary: A few months after the end of Tsukihime, life at the Tohno mansion has more or less returned to normal. Akiha is busy with school and managing the Tohno estate, Ciel gives Shiki regular after-school lessons to help him catch up on everything he missed, Hisui is ever happy to await Shiki-sama at the front door, Kohaku is as cheerful and crazy as ever and Arcueid has finally gotten firmly in touch with her feline side. Surely, this can't go on like this for long...

name: TS Marketplace: BDO 60T Unfitted Bogie Bolster Wagon Pack
summary: British Railways decided that changes in the steel industry would require the use of more bogie vehicles, and as a consequence built a number of different designs. The wagons, fitted with bolsters to support the load, were mainly grouped according to length (and hence the nominal capacity).

name: Tsukihime Typing Online
summary: a versus typing game featuring the cast of Tsukihime

name: Tsunoda Thunder Love!! Evolution!!
summary: The third entry in the Tsunoda Thunder series by Team Gris Gris.

name: Tsuki no Uroko
summary: Set against the backdrop of Lake Mirine, which beautifully reflects the moonlight, this is an adventure story featuring the spirits living in the lakeside town as they embark on a journey surrounding the "Moon's Scale" and the "Secrets of Mirine."

name: TS Marketplace: Caledonian Railway 65ft Grampian LMS Period 1 Coach Pack
summary: Caledonian Railway 65ft Grampian LMS Period 1 Coach Pack includes 10 different variants and is now available for Train Simulator!

name: TS Marketplace: BRV 50T BORAIL EB/EC Wagons Pack
summary: 1959 saw construction start on a series of four lots of vacuum braked wagons to a brand new design and are the focus of this expansion. The wagons were all built at Derby works between 1959 and 1961 and would eventually number some 165 wagons.

name: TS Marketplace: 1800s Rolling Stock Pack 02 Add-On
summary: Renowned Train Simulator creator Smokebox has brought 1860s railroading and the famed transcontinental railroad to captivating life with its Promontory Summit route and selection of historic Union Pacific and Central Pacific steam locomotives.

name: TS Marketplace: DR Schnellzugwagen Type YB Coach Pack
summary: This pack recreates Type YB express train passenger cars as operated by Deutsche Reichsbahn of the former GDR. The included liveries recreate the cars as they appeared in the 1970s and 1980s. All the cars feature passenger view and dynamic numbers.

name: Tsugunohi: Supernatural Supermarket
summary: Supernatural Supermarket, the 10th game in the J-Horror series Tsugunohi, celebrating its 10th anniversary, comes to Steam! Phantasmic blue hands reach out to grab store merchandize and mysterious writing appears that can't be erased... Get lost in the unnerving world of a supermarket after hours.

name: Tsumamigui
summary: What can a widowed woman do when she gets that itch? Invite a nubile man over to help her decorate! It has been a year since Chiho became a widow and the nights are getting lonely. It’s a good thing that her friend Kanae is there to help. Kanae is experienced, she’s been married for eight years and she knows just what Chiho needs. A little spice, a little color and some new scenery is what’s missing

name: Tsukumonogatari
summary: Tsukumonogatari is an adventure RPG for the PlayStation Portable developed by Killaware and published by FuRyu. The game was released on January 27, 2011, in Japan.

name: Tsos
summary: Tsos is an indie survival horror game made for the HauntedPS1 "Summer Of Shivers" gamejam. A gamepad is recommended for a better experience.

name: TS Marketplace: ECML Peterborough York Modern Scenario Pack 01
summary: You can now revisit this era on the East Coast Main Line with Seven Hills Simulations’ ECML Peterborough York Modern Scenario Pack 01!

name: TS Marketplace: GWR Churchward Panelled Toplights Pack 02 Add-On
summary: Churchward authorised the first toplight build in 1905, from 1907 they were built in large numbers. These two sets (57ft and 70ft) represent the earlier toplights with full panelling in the 1922 livery.

name: TS Marketplace: Maunsell 59ft Low Window Corridor Coach Pack Crimson Cream
summary: Take your simulation to the next level with these gorgeous Low Window Corridor Coaches!

name: TS Marketplace: Peninsula Corridor: San Francisco - Gilroy Scenario Mini-Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Climb aboard for contemporary and challenging Caltrain commuter railroading – with Peninsula Corridor: San Francisco - Gilroy Scenario Mini-Pack 01!

name: TS Marketplace: Norfolk Southern SD60E Livery Pack 01
summary: Expand your Crescent Cab roster with The Loco Shop’s Norfolk Southern SD60E Livery Pack 01!

name: TSR Halloween Party
summary: The cast of The Smoke Room prepare for a Halloween corn maze in a modern day AU.

name: TS Marketplace: LMS Period 1 Non-Corridor Coach Pack BR Maroon
summary: The general styling of LMS Period I coaches followed much the same ideas which were used throughout Britain.

name: TS Marketplace: Maunsell 59ft Low Window Corridor Coach Pack Southern Olive Green
summary: Take your simulation to the next level with these gorgeous Low Window Corridor Coaches! Built from 1926 to 1929 under the direction of Southern CME Richard Maunsell, these classical carriages were built to replace much of the wooden bodied pre-grouping stock Southern inherited from its constituents.

name: TS Marketplace: DR Schnellzugwagen Type B Coach Pack
summary: This pack recreates the Type B express train passenger cars as used by Deutsche Reichsbahn in the former GDR. The included liveries represent the cars as they operated in 1960s and 1970s. The models include passenger view and dynamic numbering.

name: TS Marketplace: Three Country Corner Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Three Country Corner Scenario Pack 01 includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Three Country Corner route on Steam, covering freight and passenger operations in this scenic cross-border region of Western Europe.

name: TS Marketplace: Norfolk Southern Coal District Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Go to work handling the heavy trains of eastern U. S. rail titans Norfolk Southern and CSX with High Iron Simulations' Coal District Scenario Pack 01!

name: Tsun-Tsun VR
summary:
The world of Ready Player One has finally come!
In Tsun-Tsun VR, you can feel as if you are really poked by a girl.
Through the real touch experience, Tsun-Tsun VR has realized the most immersive experience ever.

name: TS Marketplace: Donner Pass Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Donner Pass Scenario Pack 01 - featuring 10 highly realistic new career scenarios – puts you at the throttle of Southern Pacific, Union Pacific, Amtrak, and Rio Grande trains on the famed and challenging Train Simulator Donner Pass route across the Sierra Nevada Mountains of California!

name: TS Marketplace: Hudson Line Scenario Pack 01
summary: Amtrak passenger, Metro-North commuter, and CSX freight action all combine to make the Hudson Line one of America's busiest and most famous rail lines. And now, High Iron Simulations brings all that railroading drama to Train Simulator with Hudson Line Scenario Pack 01.

name: TS Marketplace: Montana Hi-Line Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
summary: Now, in High Iron Simulations' realistic and challenging Montana Hi-Line Scenario Pack 01, you'll experience the excitement of serving as an engineer on the Hi-Line route which features fast speeds, heavy volumes of rail traffic, and a sawtooth gradient profile with frequent climbs and drops of up to 1 percent!

name: Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou: Complete Limited Edition
summary:
The Complete Limited Edition includes:
- Game: Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou
- Original Soundtrack
- Drama CD

name: Tsumikui: Sen no Noroi, Sen no Inori
summary: A otome game for PC.

name: Tsuki no Namida
summary:
Winner of the Enterbrain Contest Park Web 2007 Autumn Edition Gold Prize.

Set in a world of silver, the protagonist, the kind-hearted prince "Kate," embarks on a journey from the castle to uncover the secrets of his birth. Rather than traditional RPG level-ups, character enhancement is achieved through equipment called "Talismans," into which gemstones are fitted.

In addition to the fire magic initially learned by the protagonist, it's possible to learn up to four different magics. Magic can be utilized not only in battles but also in locations marked with a "?" in towns and dungeons.

The game offers replay value with features such as Talisman crafting, combining magic to create higher-level spells, defeating monsters for "Monster Information," and striving to complete it. The graphics and characters exude a warm and gentle atmosphere, creating an emotionally impactful experience, despite lacking flashy and innovative elements.

name: Tsubasa Chronicle
summary: A turn-based RPG where the player takes control of either Syaoran or Sakura. They will visit many worlds as they try to retrieve Sakura's memories which take the form of powerful feathers.

name: TS Marketplace: Tehachapi Pass Scenario Pack 01
summary: Take the throttle and battle tonnage and treacherous Tehachapi -- with the ten action-packed and realistic career scenarios of Tehachapi Pass Scenario Pack 01!

name: TS Marketplace: Class 465 Southeastern Livery Pack Add-On
summary: Notice: You must own the Southeastern Class 465 EMU Add-On before you will be able to use this add-on.Built following the dawn of sectorisation, as part of the ill-fated Networker program, the Class 465 was designed to revolutionise rail travel from Kent into London.

name: Tsumobaka Nisshi
summary: You play a long-haired salaryman as he visits random clubs to play in 4-player mahjong against girls, who strip if they run out of funds. The games don't end until you either strip all of the girls or run out of funds yourself.

name: Tsunomaki Janken!
summary: This is a small game, that asks the important question... Are you a pro enough gamer to defeat the God of rock paper scissors?

name: Tsumige Shoujo
summary: A game about not playing games. An idle game where you interact with 'Tsumire,' a gamer robot, and play your backlog.

name: Tsuru Teruhito No Jissen
summary: A stock trading revenue generation simulation game

name: Tsuki ha Higashi ni Hi ha Nishi ni: Operation Sanctuary
summary: Naoki Kazumi is a boy whose parents died in an accident five years ago, and his memory went along with it. Since he had nowhere else to go, he lives with his cousin Matsuri Shibugaki and her parents. Every morning before school, he is awakened by his childhood friend, Honami Fujieda, who keeps telling him that he is not a child anymore, but still comes to wake him up. These usual, ordinary days seem to stretch on forever, until one day up on the school's rooftop, while Naoki is taking a peaceful nap, out of nowhere, a girl falls out of the sky. This girl, called Mikoto Amagasaki, comes from 100 years in the future, and she went back in time with the intention of finding her brother. When Mikoto sees Naoki, she mistakes him for her brother.

name: TS Marketplace: Mount Shasta Scenario Pack 01
summary: From High Iron Simulations, Mount Shasta Line Scenario Pack 01 brings to life the memorable Southern Pacific railroading of the 1980s and 1990s – with ten new and authentic career scenarios on the popular Train Simulator Classic Mount Shasta Line route!

name: Tsuyokiss Next
summary: It’s been several years since the ‘legendary era’ at Ryuumeikan. The powers of student council and the public morals committee have increased to encompass not only clubs, but also over all classes. Now the two committees which had become friendly with each other were led by two aggressive girls, Hakari and Neko. Respecting the traditions imposed by the principal Heizou, they fight each other, dragging Hakari’s follower Sanagi along in the process.

name: Tsuki no Hikari
summary: A short yuri visual novel with several optional voice options for the protagonist.

name: Tsuppari Wars
summary: Tsuppari Wars is an action video game for the Family Computer. The object is to acquire all of the enemies' territory and defeat the evil gang leaders. The gangsters fight without any weapons and the violence level is mild compared to later gang-related games. Its spiritual descendant is Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas due to its simulation of gang warfare.

name: Tsuki to Taiyou no Raksharuki
summary: In this Desert world death threatens all living beings. Main character is a trader who with brothers surfs between different nations selling goods. One day brother gets into an incident during the banquet, and king orders protagonist to retrieve a certain magical lamp within a year to save brother from punishment.

name: Tsuki to Taiyou no Raksharuki: Dancers Harem
summary: Fandisc for Tsuki to Taiyou no Raksharuki

name: Tsurupika Hagemaru: Mezase! Tsuruseko no Akashi
summary: Tsurupika Hagemaru: Mezase! Tsuruseko no Akashi is 2D platforming game released for the Famicom (NES) in 1991. The game is based on a Japanese children's manga and 58-episode anime series called Tsurupika Hagemaru (Little Baldy Hagemaru), and features many of its characters including protagonist Hagemaru whom the player controls.

name: Tsutawaru! Manaberu! Nyanko Manga de Eikaiwa
Tsuki Adventure 2
summary: The sequel to the smash hit pocket bunny’s adventure has arrived! Embark on a new journey out from the Japanese forests and countryside vistas of Mushroom Village and into the unknown! In this new episode of the beloved rabbit’s tale, follow Tsuki along the winding path as he explores the enchanting groves of the kawaii world. Immerse yourself in the charming aesthetic of a kinder world, where furry friends, thrilling mysteries, and fulfilling choices await.

name: Tsukisas Arena
summary: The simplest and deepest competitive action game set in a water tank. There is an only one law, "Stab with pointy head" !!

name: Tschess
summary:
As the game of Rugby is to Football, so the game of Chess is to tschess.
Still don't get it?
Read on...
The idea of Fischer random chess is cool insofar as it's a bust to the King's Gambit, and every other opening ~ but it removes the player's sense of agency and that's a problem.
tschess is a game that applies the heuristic of point/piece value assignment and - with the standard board as an upper bound - give the player the freedom to orchestrate their configuration however they see fit. We've also got some fairy pieces in there to keep things interesting.

name: Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai Taisen Puzzle-dama
summary:
Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai: Taisen Puzzle-dama is a Taisen Puzzle-Dama video game based on the manga Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai.
It features the cast of the manga and anime Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai and Konami's own spin on Puyo Puyo: Taisen Puzzle-Dama. The goal of the game is to compete with a series of characters from Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai depending on who the player selected.

name: TS Marketplace: Bernina Line Scenario Pack 01
summary: Take on more challenges on the stunning and demanding Bernina Line, with a selection of brand-new scenarios from Rivet Games!

name: Tsuzuku Sekai to Wakarebana
summary:
A man attends the funeral of his fiancé.

A short BL visual novel with dark atmosphere.

name: Tsuridou: Umitsuri-hen
summary: Tsuridou: Umitsuri-hen is a Sports game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by Oz Club, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou: Sweet Summer Rainbow
summary: Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou: Sweet Summer Rainbow is a game that expands the story of Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou, between the main protagonist and Rein.

name: Tserof
summary: Find hidden puzzle pieces and find the secret of a Charlotte who lost her memory.

name: TS Marketplace: Caledonian Railway 65ft Grampian Coach Pack Add-On
summary: These coaches were built between 1903 and 1909 to the design of John McIntosh, the Locomotive Superintendent of the Caledonian Railway, for the Glasgow, Edinburgh and Aberdeen service known as "The Grampian Express".

name: Tsuppari Oozumou
summary: Tsuppari Oozumou is a sumo wrestling game. The goal is to wrestle the opponent out of the ring. The opponents get harder as the game progresses. Different moves can be performed depending on button and directional combinations.

name: Tsubasa+
summary:
TSUBASA+ is a real-world game that combines Captain Tsubasa, around the world, and FIFPro soccer players to allow you to build your own team, and battle other players.

Players walk around the real world and battle with Captain Tsubasa characters and real soccer players at stadiums scattered around the game! Recruit a variety of players onto your team. Create your very own team from your recruits while you play in 1-on-1 battles with 3 players around the world to make the best team possible!

This title no longer appears on mobile stores as of Q3 2021.

name: Tsuihou Senkyo
summary: The game takes place in an abandoned amusement park. The game's characters are trapped within the park, with the outside world being in a post-apocalyptic wasteland infested with murderous monsters. Within the park, the game's thirteen main characters are held captive by a mysterious mechanical doll named "Alice", who holds the "death games", which basically force the characters against each other for survival - the losers being exiled back out into the world. Alice refuses to stop the games until only two characters are alive and present. The game's protagonist is Kaname Ichijou, a young man who has the ability to see sound as colors and sees spoken falsehoods in the color red. He also harbors a grudge against most of the rest of the characters of the game for allowing the exile of his little sister.

name: Tsuki ni Yorisou Otome no Sahou
TS Marketplace: NER/GNR Non-Corridor LNER Pack
summary: These coaches of North Eastern Railway and Great Northern Railway pedigree were built from around 1907. The NER coaches were built under the direction of Wilson Worsdell (the CME of the NER) whilst the GNR were designed by Sir Herbert Nigel Gresley (CME of the GNR and LNER).

name: Ts Fantasy
summary: Date with Cute Girls as you save people! This is new Adventure Visual Novel game!! Explore Ts Fantasy, and save the world using your special powers and with the help of your friends. Your relationship with characters differs according to the choices you make!!

name: Tsumi no Hikari Rendez-vous
summary:
In front of the lone tunnel leading out from the small village of Tamasato, Yuuto draws a picture of a mermaid living in the deep ocean where light does not reach. One day, he looked up from his drawing and there was a girl in front of him who looked just like the one on his canvas. She called herself a ‘sinner’ who came to this town to repent for her sins. Yuuto and the townspeople welcomed the girl, Ai, to their town.

Come spring, the entrance ceremony was underway. The new students took pictures and videos in front of the school with their parents to commemorate this special day. However, it was a depressing event for Yuuto, who lives alone after the death of his father and the abandonment by his mother and older sister. While he had gotten used to it, this time he suddenly felt very lonely due to the recent passing of grandmother, the sole close relative he had left.

Upon finding out about Yuuto’s loneliness, Ai confided that she was abandoned by her parents. She searched for a reason for living, whereas he ran away from reality through his imaginative drawings. Even though they were polar opposites, their backgrounds also made them quite similar. Gradually, they became closer to each other, while harbouring secrets of their own.

name: Tsukiweb
summary: An unofficial web-based, open-source reimplementation of the 2000 visual novel Tsukihime.

name: Tsukumobake
summary: Un gioco da tavolo basato sul mito giapponese de "La parata notturna dei 100 demoni".

name: Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan
summary: Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan is a top-down over-the-top fishing video medal game. The game is set within an aquatic theme park, with players participating in attractions using their own customizable avatar (reminiscent of those from the Animal Crossing series). As players earn more medals, they can spend them to not only upgrade the medal games, but also acquire fish for the park's explorable exotic aquarium.
